MemoryInfobox.location: Temple of Aphrodite, Kythera|Temple of Aphrodite, Kythera

General_Description: '''Made in Abyss''' was a virtual representation of one of [[Kassandra]]'s genetic memories, relived by [[Layla Hassan]] through the portable [[Animus|Animus HR-8.5]].
Section_Riddle: ''South of [[Skandeia Bay]], from the [[Aphrodite|goddess]]' light I ran. Past the den of teeth and bones, past poor sacrificial lambs. Across the sea on a lonely [[Chytra Atoll|isle]] where [[ship]]s reluctantly rest in peace, I nestled deep in a dark [[Ogylos Cave|chamber]] and bade goodnight to [[Greece]].''
Section_Outcome: Kassandra found and recovered the engraving in the [[Ogylos Cave]] on [[Chytra Atoll]] south of [[Kythera Island]].
Section_References:
*''[[Assassin's Creed: Odyssey]]''
